A zoo's TOP responsibility is to protect both people and endangered species.... No way should a child have that much time away from his parents to get into the pit, and then the pit should have been totally secured and enter proof - even have camera's or sounding alarms when anyone enters the restricted area. Zoo's should also have an emergency plan, either fast acting tranquilizer or taser and start training SWAT team ready to jump in and save the child, and wrap up the animal with net or rope..... now we have lost another endangered beautiful animal... One day the zoo too will be extinct....

As I understand this issue, having to state your party affiliation prevents voters from the other side from overwhelming the ballot box in favor of whom THEY want to face in the general election. If this is a GOP primary, then only GOP voters should have a say in picking the candidate that will represent the GOP. Did I miss something here?

Well, let's see here. Does Israel have legal boundaries? Are half of Jerusalem, the West Bank and Golan Heights outside those boundaries? Yes on all counts. Are the settlements in those areas outside the legal boundaries of Israel? Yes. Are the walls Israel has built to restrict traffic in Palestine outside the boundaries of Israel? Yes. Are the people fighting against the settlements doing so for what's theirs? Yes. Are they being slaughtered imprisoned, disfranchised from their own lands by Israel? Yes.
So very sad.... I would guess that probably one slipped and the other tried to help and slipped as well. That seems like the only explanation. Bless them and their families.....
